LanguageData.SK_Technology.label: 基本科技
LanguageData.SK_Technology.description: 了解在这个残酷星球上生存的基本要素。为你的殖民地解锁烤架、燃料炉和一些床类家具。
LanguageData.Electricity.label: 电力
LanguageData.Electricity.description: 研究如何发电，并将电力用于其他简单的作业。
LanguageData.SK_ProductionI.label: 生产 I
LanguageData.SK_ProductionI.description: 学习如何提炼和制作一些有用的东西。让你的殖民者了解大麻和烟叶的各种用途，例如制作特殊的卷烟、利用麻纤维和各种医药用途。 \n\n同时还解锁糖果工作台来制作一些甜食和弹药工作台来为您的枪和炮塔制造备用弹药。
LanguageData.SK_ProductionII.label: 生产 II
LanguageData.SK_ProductionII.description: 学习如何用电能提炼和制造一些有用的东西。允许你的殖民者建造一个复杂的咖啡机，它把咖啡豆变成热饮，而且你也可以用它泡茶。 \n\n同时解锁电力炉灶和电力酿造台。
LanguageData.Brewing.label: 酿造
LanguageData.Brewing.description: 解锁各种酒精酿造工艺。
LanguageData.BrewingII.label: 软性酒
LanguageData.BrewingII.description: 解锁酿造更多种类的低度饮料。
LanguageData.BrewingIII.label: 烈性酒
LanguageData.BrewingIII.description: 解锁酿造更多种类的复杂饮料。
LanguageData.SK_ProductionIII.label: 生产 III
LanguageData.SK_ProductionIII.description: 对如何用电来提炼和制造有用的东西有很深的知识。解锁各类电压力容器——罐头食品压制工作台，以及用来批量生产食物的专业烹调炉。
LanguageData.Refining.label: 化学
LanguageData.Refining.description: 解锁基本的生物化学知识，例如用玉米来制作生物燃料。
LanguageData.DrugProduction.label: 成瘾品研究 II
LanguageData.DrugProduction.description: 了解药物制备和合成的基础知识。解锁建造药物实验台，以及为研究制造特殊药物做知识准备。
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.label: 精神药物提炼
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.description: 允许殖民者对精神叶进行精炼，制作「薄片」和「呀呦粉」。。
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.label: 清醒丸制作
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.description: 学会制作「清醒丸」，清醒丸可以延长殖民者的工作时间，使其忘却疲劳，但是带有一些副作用。
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.label: 活力水制作
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.description: 学会制作这种名为「活力水」的合成的战斗增强兴奋剂。
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.label: 佩诺西林制作
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.description: 学会制作「佩诺西林」，一种疾病防治药物。
LanguageData.SK_BiochemistryII.label: 生物化学
LanguageData.SK_BiochemistryII.description: 允许你的殖民者建造化学实验室，可以用来制造医疗器械和先进的假体部件。
LanguageData.SK_Bioenergy.label: 生物能源
LanguageData.SK_Bioenergy.description: 学习如何将不同的生物材料转化成为电力。解锁生物发电机，需要消耗生物柴油或其他生物燃料生产电力。
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.label: 食物合成机
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.description: 解锁建造「食物合成机」，能自动将生食高效地合成为营养膏。用于应对食物短缺。
LanguageData.NutrientPasteII.label: 营养物质学
LanguageData.NutrientPasteII.description: 解锁建造绿色营养物质机，能够从人类生物尸体中提炼高能营养物质。
LanguageData.SK_GlassworkingI.label: 玻璃工艺
LanguageData.SK_GlassworkingI.description: 制造纯净的玻璃需要用极高的温度加热沙子，虽然看起来是比较难以达成的，但是需要你用各种方法尝试并且寻找到最具性价比的途径。解锁玻璃工作台。
LanguageData.SK_GlassworkingII.label: 玻璃纤维
LanguageData.SK_GlassworkingII.description: 玻璃易碎，但是通过合适的方法提炼加工并强化，你会发觉玻璃有极高极广的使用价值。
LanguageData.SK_MedicineI.label: 生物学
LanguageData.SK_MedicineI.description: 了解基本的医药“艺术”。缺胳膊少腿么？还是缺点其他的东西？没事，拿块木头拿块铁，砰砰砰！搞定！解锁假体工作台。
LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: 医疗设施 I
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: 解锁部分医疗设备，你可以更加轻松的治疗一些诸如冻伤、割伤等小问题。你也可以为还有一口气的殖民者安装生命支持系统，或者修建一些病床。
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.label: 医疗设施 II
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.description: 进阶的医疗知识为你提供了更佳的治疗方案。你现在可以为殖民者移植一些小型的次要身体部件类似于鼻子、耳朵之类，或者用人造骨骼来修复一些身体损伤、深度疤痕、割伤等等。亦可以建造生命体征监测仪来提高医疗质量、手术成功率等。
LanguageData.VitalsMonitorI.label: 医疗设施 III
LanguageData.VitalsMonitorI.description: Improvements in medical art opens new surgical operations. You can now install some internal natural organs like heart and liver, natural body parts such as arms, legs, eyes, as well as make advanced beds specially designed to treat injured people。
LanguageData.SK_HospitalIV.label: 医疗设施 IV
LanguageData.SK_HospitalIV.description: Now your doctors can heal chronic diseases: Heart Artery Blockage, Alzheimer, Muscle Parasites, Dementia, Cataract, Hearing Loss, Frail and Bad Back。
LanguageData.MedicineProduction.label: Medicine
LanguageData.MedicineProduction.description: After this research you may build Medical Tables that is used to craft medicine。
LanguageData.SK_MedicineIII.label: Genetics
LanguageData.SK_MedicineIII.description: Breakthrough in genetic manipulation makes it possible to construct Organ Vat, that is used to turn human corpses into biomatter and to grow natural replacement organs。
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.label: Tailoring I
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.description: Learn basics of tailoring art. Unlock Tailor's Loom - a workbench equipped for tailoring basic clothing from textiles。
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.label: Carpet Making
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.description: This allows colonists to build plush carpets that will increase the quality of their environments。
LanguageData.CarpetMakingII.label: Expert carpet making
LanguageData.CarpetMakingII.description: This allows colonists to build plush carpets that will increase the quality of their environments。
LanguageData.TailoringII.label: Tailoring II
LanguageData.TailoringII.description: Improvements in tailoring art opens new Electric Tailoring Bench - a workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes。
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.label: Tailoring III
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.description: Neuro-memetic robotics and advanced stein weaving technologies allow you to build the power armor and power armor helmets。
LanguageData.SK_ElectronicsI.label: Electronics basics
LanguageData.SK_ElectronicsI.description: Generate and use electricity for cooking and other simple tasks。
LanguageData.SK_TelecommunicationI.label: Telecommunication
LanguageData.SK_TelecommunicationI.description: This allows colonists to construct communications station like Comms Console and Orbital Trade Beacon, so they may interact with other colonies and trade ships。
LanguageData.SK_TelecommunicationII.label: Orbital Networks
LanguageData.SK_TelecommunicationII.description: This research allows colonists to build Subspace Burst Transponders to contact Ships at a distance and guide them to your colony。
LanguageData.SK_TelecommunicationIII.label: Hypercomputing
LanguageData.SK_TelecommunicationIII.description: Depth of telecommunication knowledge allows colonists to build a computer terminal that provides remote access to some options of the tactical computer。
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.label: Microelectronics basics
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.description: The basics of working with delicate, complex electronics. This unlocks 生产 of Integrated Circuits and construction of Mineral Sonars - which is a device that can scan deposits in mountains to identify minerals。
LanguageData.ResearchMobileMineralSonarEnhancedScan.d: By doing some code refactoring in the MiSoTech* noise reduction algorithms, your researchers could improve the mobile mineral sonar efficiency. - Improve the MiSoTech* to enhance the mobile mineral sonar efficiency.

MiSoTech* algorithms have been refactored and optimized. The spare CPU time has been reallocated to enhance the scan range and detection algorithms. - Mobile mineral sonar scan range is increased (30 -> 50). - Mobile mineral sonar detection chance is increased.
LanguageData.SK_ElectronicsIII.label: Nanoelectronics basics
LanguageData.SK_ElectronicsIII.description: This research allows colonists to make Microchip Integrated Circuits, Life-Support device and Brain Stimulator。
LanguageData.SK_BionicsI.label: Bionics
LanguageData.SK_BionicsI.description: Discovering the concept of very small motors and circuits, new possibilities of better Synthetic internal organs prostheses and building of Synthetic Organ Assembler are now open for you。
LanguageData.SK_BionicsII.label: Bio engineering
LanguageData.SK_BionicsII.description: Upgrade regular bionics with BioMaterial to make them even better. Opens Bionics Workbench and different small bionic prostheses。
LanguageData.SK_BionicsIII.label: Biometallurgy
LanguageData.SK_BionicsIII.description: Breakthroughs in bionics tech and robotics allow consruction of highly advanced medical facilities。
LanguageData.Stonecutting.label: Stonecutting
LanguageData.Stonecutting.description: Build stonecutting tables, which allow you to refine rock chunks into stone blocks that can be used for construction。
LanguageData.SK_Quarry.label: Quarry
LanguageData.SK_Quarry.description: New research in mining art allows you to build quarry - a large pit for digging up long buried resources。
LanguageData.SK_MiningI.label: Mining
LanguageData.SK_MiningI.description: This research unlocks Drilling Rig - a powerful machine capable of drilling an Oil Fissure in Deposits of Crude Oil。
LanguageData.DeepDrilling.label: Geology
LanguageData.DeepDrilling.description: Unlocks the Mine Extractor, Clay collector and Oil Extractor. The Mine Extractor is a machine capable of extracting metals from Deposits of Minerals in the earth. The Clay collector collects soft clay from wet areas of ground... An Oil Extractor can then extract Crude Oil from the Oil Fissure。
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.label: Geophysics
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.description: Final research in mining art. Unlocks the advanced mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract rare metal ores。
LanguageData.SK_Petrochemistry.label: Petrochemical plant
LanguageData.SK_Petrochemistry.description: Enables construction of the Petrochemical Plant. This building can refine Crude Oil into usable raw materials, as well as process the materials into finished products such as Rubber and Plastic。
LanguageData.Machining.label: Machining
LanguageData.Machining.description: Start in researching of machining arts. Unlocks Electric Sawmill and Mending Workbench with 生产 of mending kits for your apparel。
LanguageData.SK_MachiningII.label: Advanced machining
LanguageData.SK_MachiningII.description: Unlocks the Electric Machining Table that can process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Drill Heads can be made here. Mechanoid bodies can be disassembled here。
LanguageData.ComponentAssembly.label: 3D Printing
LanguageData.ComponentAssembly.description: Unlocks the Electric Assembling Bench - an electric table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms, and advanced mechanisms and basic hand tools。
LanguageData.TransportPod.label: Transportation
LanguageData.TransportPod.description: Construct launchable transport pods that you can use to launch people and supplies long distances across the planet's surface。
LanguageData.SK_AppliedPhysicsI.label: Exotic Matter
LanguageData.SK_AppliedPhysicsI.description: Unlocks the Inorganic Matter Converter - a converter to turn resources into inorganic matter. Inorganic matter can be used to make other resources。
LanguageData.SK_Robotics.label: Robotics
LanguageData.SK_Robotics.description: Allows you to build small robots for simple tasks such as cleaning and hauling。
LanguageData.SK_NanotechnologyI.label: Nanotechnology
LanguageData.SK_NanotechnologyI.description: Research how to expand your storage capabilities. Allows you to build a specialized storage. Each nano storage can hold up to ten items。
LanguageData.SK_NanotechnologyII.label: NanoReplication
LanguageData.SK_NanotechnologyII.description: Research how to modify your nano bots to replicate objects. Allows you to build a nano printer. It has the capability to replicate scanned items. Also unlocks Nano Scanner that allows the nano printer to scan the internal structure of objects。
LanguageData.SK_Cybernetics.label: Cybernetics
LanguageData.SK_Cybernetics.description: Allows you to create new cybernetics body parts in a Chemical Laboratory。
LanguageData.SK_DermalRegenerator.label: Dermal regenerator
LanguageData.SK_DermalRegenerator.description: Allows construction of the Dermal Regenerator. This is a medical device that is able to scan and repair surface tissue scars。
LanguageData.Personal_Shield_research.label: Nanite shielding
LanguageData.Personal_Shield_research.description: Using nano technology Nanites have been developed that can be implanted in colonists to heal them or protect them from damage. Unfortunately due to the limited power and size of the Nanites they must be replaced from the Colonist Upgrade Station after each use.
LanguageData.SK_AppliedPhysicsII.label: Quantum mechanics
LanguageData.SK_AppliedPhysicsII.description: Unlocks Hadron Collider - an apparatus for accelerating subatomic particles to high velocities by means of electric or electromagnetic fields. The accelerated particles are generally made to collide with other particles, either as a research technique or for the generation of high-energy X-rays and gamma rays。
LanguageData.SK_Antimatter.label: Antimatter
LanguageData.SK_Antimatter.description: The antimatter contained separate from the normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions。
LanguageData.SK_AppliedPhysicsIII.label: Alien Materials
LanguageData.SK_AppliedPhysicsIII.description: Advanced factorization the step in understanding the basics of advanced manufacturing methods, to give your colony access to the latest assembly machinery。
LanguageData.ShipBasics.label: Austronautics
LanguageData.ShipBasics.description: Allows you to start researching more advanced shipbuilding technologies and eventually build a ship to escape the planet。
LanguageData.ShipSensorCluster.label: ship sensor cluster
LanguageData.ShipSensorCluster.description: Allows you to construct long-range sensors for a ship。
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.label: Spaceship caskets
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.description: Allows you to construct ship cryptosleep caskets for transporting cryptosleeping colonists between the stars。
LanguageData.ShipEngine.label: Spaceship antimatter propulsion
LanguageData.ShipEngine.description: Allows you to use an antimatter containment core to construct an antimatter drive for a ship。
LanguageData.ShipReactor.label: Spaceship antimatter reactor
LanguageData.ShipReactor.description: Allows you to use an antimatter containment core to build a working antimatter reactor to power a ship。
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.label: Spaceship computer core
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.description: Allows coercing an existing AI persona into a usable AI computer core for ship guidance。
LanguageData.Smithing.label: Smithing
LanguageData.Smithing.description: Build smithies for crafting metal weapons and tools。
LanguageData.LongBlades.label: Weapon smithing
LanguageData.LongBlades.description: Learn how to craft powerful swords and spears。
LanguageData.Greatbows.label: Throwing weapons
LanguageData.Greatbows.description: Learn to craft powerful bows and crossbows。
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.label: Metalworking
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.description: Learn how to build electric smithy and Weapon Crafting Workbench.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The Weapon Crafting Workbench produces ranged weapons like pistols and rifles. Can smelt weapons down into metal。
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.label: Advanced metalworking
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.description: Learn how to construct Advanced Weapon Crafting Workbench that produces advanced ranged weapons like military assault rifles, missile launchers and heavy machine guns。
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.label: Hightech metalworking
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.description: Learn now to build Mechanoid Weapon Workbench that produces futuristic Mechanoid weapons, such as laser beam rifles。
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.label: Metallurgy
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.description: Learn how to build electric smelters. The electric smelters uses heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items。
LanguageData.SK_MetallurgyII.label: Casting
LanguageData.SK_MetallurgyII.description: Learn how to prepare different metals like Aluminium, Cupronicke, Ferromanganese and Ferrosilicon。
LanguageData.SK_MetallurgyIII.label: Thermodynamics
LanguageData.SK_MetallurgyIII.description: Metal Fabrication allows us to work with hitech alloys. Specifically using complex materials like Ferronickel, CobaltIron, Alnico and Nichrome。
LanguageData.SK_MetallurgyIV.label: Nano metallurgy
LanguageData.SK_MetallurgyIV.description: Depths of metallurgy art unlocks new recipes for EAP like Titanium, Tungsten, Stellite, Ferrotitanium, Nitino and Pobedite。
LanguageData.SK_ConstructionI.label: Construction I
LanguageData.SK_ConstructionI.description: Learn the basics of putting the raw materials of this planet to good use. This technology unlocks the ability to construct robust structures using metal bars and stone blocks. Also unlocks roofs construction and Hand Concrete Mixer。
LanguageData.SK_ConstructionII.label: Construction II
LanguageData.SK_ConstructionII.description: Further advancements in construction, unlock Electric Concrete Mixer. Also unlocks Motion Sensor Lighted Wall to light up your colonists along their merry way。
LanguageData.SK_ConstructionIII.label: Construction III
LanguageData.SK_ConstructionIII.description: Nothing says keep out like a steel reinforced door blocking your way. Continued advancement in construction unlocks the ability to secure your base with blast doors。
